overview:
Jim Peterson is a founding member of Verisae and currently serves as Verisae’s Chief Technology Officer and Executive Vice President of Operations.

With over 20 years of experience with customer facing development, deployment, and management experience, Jim is an expert at using technology to solve real world business problems. He is responsible for the development, delivery and support of our enterprise applications worldwide

Prior to joining Verisae, Jim was Vice President at Loral CyberStar; previously, he served as Director of Technology for John Ryan Company.

relationships.title: Chief Technology Officer (CTO) and Executive Vice President of Operations (EVP)
